Education & Work Experience

  • 08/2022 – Present, Assistant Researcher, MAIS, Institute of Automation, CAS.
  • 03/2021 – 08/2022, Senior Algorithm Expert, JD.com.
  • 06/2018 – 03/2021, Postdoctoral Researcher, Aerospace Information Research Institute, CAS. Supervisor: Professor Guojin He.
  • 09/2014 – 06/2017, Ph.D. in Pattern Recognition and Intelligent System, Institute of Automation, CAS. Supervisor: Professor Chunhong Pan.
  • 09/2011 – 06/2014, M.S. in Computer Technology, Institute of Automation, CAS.
  • 09/2007 – 06/2011, B.S. in Automation, Tianjin University of Science and Technology, Tianjin.

Patent

  1. Infrared image segmentation method and device based on visible light image enhancement (granted). Kun Ding, Haojian Zhang, Gaofeng Meng, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202410122134.4.
  2. Image translation model construction method, image translation method and device (granted). Kun Ding, Hua Wu, Ying Wang, Gaofeng Meng, Shiming Xiang, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202410265853.1.
  3. Image segmentation method, device, equipment and storage medium (granted). Kun Ding, Haojian Zhang, Gaofeng Meng, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202410414073.9.
  4. Semi-supervised infrared image segmentation method (granted). Kun Ding, Shiming Xiang, Gaofeng Meng, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202410450421.8.
  5. Training methods for infrared image segmentation models and infrared image segmentation methods (granted). Kun Ding, Hua Wu, Ying Wang, Gaofeng Meng, Shiming Xiang, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202410248502.X.
  6. Image classification network architecture design method, apparatus, device, and medium (granted). Shiming Xiang, Xing Nie, Ying Wang, Kun Ding, Chunhong Pan. Chinese Patent: CN202311040570.9.
